name: TheRiverChurch
0:
”Alexa, open The River Church”
”Alexa, ask The River Church for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start The River Church”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the river church
des: Listen to the latest sermons from The River Church in Camden, SC. You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. When listening to podcasts you can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. You can also ask for previous and next messages by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next".
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
